reviews.text: I absolutely adore this bubble park. It's great fun. I had a blast. Trampoline and the bubble are superb. All the things that are there are 6 euros but if you more tickets it's better value and we got ignored by the staff even though he saw us waiting.

Came across this place when walking around the back outdoor area of the shopping centre (see pic).  I was disappointed it was just for kids because it looked so much fun - lots of water play and splash games, bungee jumping with harness and so many fun activities.

Its located right next to the food court and the shopping mall and the aquarium right next to the port, there are 5 activists. 1 the bubble race 2 the water cars 3 the trampoline rope jumper 4 the gravity spinner 5 the tricycle race each game takes 5-10 minutes but you can pay for more than one round.

Located next to the aquarium. Bungee jumping was great fun for my eleven yr old, a group of teenage girls and a couple of little kids. The other activities were a bust. Was way too hot for the bikes and the water bubbles. My kid came out soaked with sweat and unhappy! 6€ for each turn or 15€ for 3. Overall, different and pretty cheap activity if you're in the area in Barcelona.
